341.abilityText: ST+40 / Critical Hit: When equipped creature has a Rarity of N.

342.name: Tearing Halo
342.abilityText: Scroll Attack: ST=30 / Scroll Critical Hit: Unless equipped creature is Neutral / Immune to Destroy Item and Steal Item effects.

343.name: Tombstone
343.abilityText: Immune to Destroy Item and Steal Item effects. / Upon Defeat: User draws cards until their hand contains 6 cards.

345.name: Topaz Amulet
345.abilityText: Instant Death: 60% against Fire and Air creatures. / Neutralizes: Fire+Air

347.name: Turquoise Amulet
347.abilityText: Instant Death: 60% against Water and Earth creatures. / Neutralizes: Water+Earth

348.name: Twin Spike
348.abilityText: ST+20 / Attack Bonus: Transforms opponent into same creature as equipped creature.

349.name: Vorpal Sword
349.abilityText: ST+30 / Critical Hit: Creatures with MHP of 40 and up.

350.name: Warlock's Disk
350.abilityText: In Battle: Disables all effects and abilities. (Activates first.)

351.name: Wonder Charm
351.abilityText: Neutralizes: 80% of damage received from Normal Attacks.

352.name: Air Shift
352.abilityText: Changes target territory belonging to user into an Air land.

353.name: Alarm
353.abilityText: Removes Fatigued from all creatures owned by the user.

354.name: Assemble Cards
354.abilityText: Hidden / User gains 500G if their hand contains at least one creature of each element. (Fire+Water+Earth+Air) / If not, user draws 2 cards.

355.name: Asteroid
355.abilityText: Lowers target territory's level by 1. / Synthesis: Asteroid (Changes effect to Target territory's level becomes 1.)

356.name: Barrier
356.abilityText: Adds Anti-Spell to target Cepter. (For 5 rounds, target Cepter cannot be chosen as the target of a spell.)

357.name: Binding Mist
357.abilityText: Adds Paralysis to target creature. (Creatures cannot attack or use items and their abilities do not activate.)

358.name: Blackout
358.abilityText: Adds Sleep to target enemy Cepter. (For 2 rounds, target enemy Cepter cannot claim tolls.)

359.name: Blast Trap
359.abilityText: Adds Explosion Trap to target creature. (Next time a Cepter stops here, they lose 40% of their Current Magic, and HP-20 to the creature on this territory.)

360.name: Bounty Hunt
360.abilityText: Adds Bounty to target creature. (Can't be moved or exchanged by Territory Command. If killed with a weapon, the Cepter that killed it gets 300G.)

361.name: Blaze Splash
361.abilityText: HP-30 to target Fire or Water creature.

362.name: Bright World
362.abilityText: Adds No Conditions to the world. (For 6 rounds, all conditions and all costs besides magic are ignored when placing a creature.)

363.name: Burning Hail
363.abilityText: HP-20 to all Water and Air creatures.

364.name: Chaos Panic
364.abilityText: Adds Reverse Movement to all Cepters. (On the next turn, all Cepters will move backwards.)

365.name: Charging Step
365.abilityText: Adds Magic Steps to target Cepter. (Makes dice roll 2-4 for two rounds and user gains 50G every time they roll the dice.)

366.name: Chariot
366.abilityText: Moves user's target creature 2 spaces. / Recycles to Book.

367.name: Clairvoyance
367.abilityText: User obtains magic equal to 1/2 the value of all of the Spell Cards in target Cepter's hand. / User views the Hidden cards in target Cepter's hand.

368.name: Cluster Burst
368.abilityText: HP-20 to all creatures of the most numerous element in play. (Including Neutral.)

369.name: Dark World
369.abilityText: Adds Anti-Spell to the world. (For 6 rounds, all creatures with an Enchantment cannot be targeted by spells.)

370.name: Debility
370.abilityText: ST=0 to target creature. / Synthesis: Spells (MHP-20 to target creature.) / User draws a card.

371.name: Disaster
371.abilityText: HP-30 to all Fatigued creatures with MHP of 50 or more.

372.name: Discord
372.abilityText: Transforms all of the most numerous kind of creature on the map into Goblins.

373.name: Disease
373.abilityText: Adds Ability -20 to target creature. (In battle, this creature is inflicted with ST & HP-20.) / User will draw 1 card.

374.name: Diselement
374.abilityText: Adds Nullify Land Effect to target creature (No land effect). / Synthesis: Creatures (Changes target to all Fatigued creatures.) / User draws a card.

375.name: Dominant Growth
375.abilityText: Adds Growth Command to target creature. (MHP+20 when Terrain Change or Land Level Up are used on this creature's territory (max. 100).)

376.name: Drain Magic
376.abilityText: User steals 30% of target enemy Cepter's Current Magic.

377.name: Dream Terrain
377.abilityText: Adds Shared Toll Fees to user. (For 5 rounds, user gains 50% of tolls collected by other Cepters.)

378.name: Earth Shift
378.abilityText: Changes target territory belonging to user into a Earth land.

379.name: Elemental Wrath
379.abilityText: HP-20 to all creatures whose element doesn't match the land they're on.

380.name: Energy Field
380.abilityText: Adds Magic Barrier to target creature. (Gain the following abilities: Neutralizes: Normal Attacks and Battle End: Opponent steals 100G.)

381.name: Erosion
381.abilityText: If target Cepter has 2 or more of the same card in their hand, those cards are destroyed. / Synthesis: Spells (Changes target to all Cepters.)

382.name: Escape
382.abilityText: Transports user to the nearest vacant land. (User cannot roll the dice this turn.)

383.name: Exchange
383.abilityText: Exchanges target creature with another creature from its owner's hand.

384.name: Exile
384.abilityText: Returns 1 creature with an Enchantment and no summoning conditions to its owner's hand.

385.name: Fat Body
385.abilityText: MHP+20 & ST-20 to target creature. (up to a max of 100 MHP).

386.name: Fear
386.abilityText: Returns target Cepter's creature with the lowest MHP to their hand.

387.name: Fire Shift
387.abilityText: Changes target territory belonging to user into a Fire land.

388.name: Flatland
388.abilityText: Hidden / If user has five or more level 2 territories, raise each land's level by 1. / If not, Recycles to book.

389.name: Fluxion
389.abilityText: Hidden / User steals 30% of target enemy Cepter's magic if user possesses less Current Magic than opponent.

390.name: Fly
390.abilityText: User uses 3 dice for their next roll.

391.name: Foresight
391.abilityText: User views the top 6 cards in their book, then selects 1 to place in their hand.

392.name: Form Portal
392.abilityText: Teleports user to the nearest gate. (User cannot roll the dice this turn.)

393.name: Freeze Cyclone
393.abilityText: HP-20 to all Fire and Earth creatures.

394.name: Gift
394.abilityText: User gains (User's rank x50)G. / User draws a number of cards equal to their rank from their book.

395.name: Goblin's Lair
395.abilityText: Places Goblin on land occupied by user if it is currently vacant. / Recycles to Hand.

396.name: Greed
396.abilityText: Adds 1.5x Toll to target creature. (This creature's toll fees are multiplied by 1.5.) / User draws 1 card.

397.name: Growth Body
397.abilityText: MHP+10 to target creature (up to a max of 100).

398.name: Haste
398.abilityText: Adds Dice 6-8 to target Cepter. (Target Cepter's next two dice rolls yield from 6 to 8.)

399.name: Holy Banishment
399.abilityText: Returns target creature to its Cepter's hand if the creature's element differs from the territory it inhabits.

400.name: Holy Word 1
400.abilityText: Adds Dice 1 to target Cepter. (Target Cepter's next dice roll yields a 1.)

401.name: Holy Word 3
401.abilityText: Adds Dice 3 to target Cepter. (Target Cepter's next dice roll yields a 3.)

402.name: Holy Word 6
402.abilityText: Adds Dice 6 to target Cepter. (Target Cepter's next dice roll yields a 6.)

403.name: Holy Word 8
403.abilityText: Adds Dice 8 to target Cepter. (Target Cepter's next dice roll yields a 8.)

404.name: Home Ground
404.abilityText: Hidden / If user has 4 or more placed creatures whose element doesn't match the land they're on, the lands will change to match the creatures. / If not, Recycles to book.

405.name: Hyperactive
405.abilityText: Adds Vigorous to target creature. (For 5 rounds, target creature gains the Vigorous ability.)

406.name: Immobilize
406.abilityText: Adds Immobilize to all creatures. (Cannot be moved by Territory Commands.)

407.name: Incineration
407.abilityText: User gains (number of creatures destroyed thus far x20)G, then the number is reset.

408.name: Influence
408.abilityText: Changes target territory into its owner's most numerous land element.

409.name: Insect Swarm
409.abilityText: HP-20 to all creatures that are not at maximum HP.

410.name: Joint World
410.abilityText: Adds Cross-Element Chains to world. (For 6 rounds, Fire and Earth territories chain together and Water and Air territories chain together.)

411.name: Land Drain
411.abilityText: User steals (number of target's possessed territories x30)G from target enemy Cepter.

412.name: Land Transfer
412.abilityText: Releases target territory from user's control and reverts it to magic at 70% of its value.

413.name: Life Force
413.abilityText: Adds Life Force to target Cepter. (Creature and Item Cards' cost becomes 0G. When this Cepter uses a spell, that spell is neutralized and this Enchantment vanishes.)

414.name: Life Stream
414.abilityText: Fully recovers the HP of all creatures owned by the user.

415.name: Liquid Form
415.abilityText: Adds Random Ability Value to target creature. (In battle, target creature's ST & HP= Random value between 10-70.) / User draws a card.

416.name: Long Line
416.abilityText: Hidden / If user owns 4 or more territories in a row, user gains 500G. / If not, user draws 2 cards.

418.name: Magical Leap
418.abilityText: Transports user to any nearby territory of user's choice within 1 to 4 spaces. User cannot roll the dice this turn.

419.name: Magic Shelter
419.abilityText: Adds Anti-Spell Wall to target creature. (Target creature cannot be targeted by spells and will be treated as if it has the Defensive ability.)

420.name: Magma Shift
420.abilityText: Changes target level 3 or lower Fire territory into a Earth land, or changes target level 3 or lower Earth territory into a Fire land.

422.name: Mass Growth
422.abilityText: MHP+5 to all creatures (up to a max of 100). / Synthesis: Items (Changes target to all creatures owned by the user.)

423.name: Mass Phantasm
423.abilityText: Adds Nullified HP Effects to all creatures. (HP and MHP cannot be altered by spells.)

424.name: Merciful World
424.abilityText: Adds Mercy to world. (For 6 rounds, all Cepters cannot invade territories of Cepters ranked below them.)

425.name: Metal Form
425.abilityText: Adds Metallization to target creature. (Has Neutralizes: Normal Attacks, but cannot use armor.)

426.name: Metamorphosis
426.abilityText: User selects an item or Spell Card from target enemy Cepter's hand and changes all copies of the selected card in all Cepter's hands and books to Holy Word 6.

427.name: Miracle Call
427.abilityText: User draws 1 Evo Card from their book. / If an Evo Card can't be drawn, user draws 2 cards instead.

428.name: Mirror World
428.abilityText: Adds Extinction to world. (For 6 rounds, at Battle Start, if either creature has multiple copies in play, that creature is destroyed.)

429.name: Misty World
429.abilityText: Adds Anti-Spell to the world. (For 6 rounds, all Cepters cannot be targeted by spells.)

430.name: Natural World
430.abilityText: Adds Abilities Disabled to the world. (For 6 rounds, Secret Art, Upon Defeat, and Battle End abilities do not activate.)

431.name: Obliteration
431.abilityText: All Cepters lose (number of Element Gems owned x70)G. / If there is no Gem Store, all Cepters lose 10% of their current magic.

432.name: Outrage
432.abilityText: Moves target creature to adjacent enemy territory.

433.name: Pacifism
433.abilityText: Adds No Invasions to all Cepters. (For 2 rounds, you cannot invade.)

434.name: Peace
434.abilityText: Adds Peace to target creature. (Cannot be invaded, and toll becomes 0G.)

435.name: Penalize
435.abilityText: Adds Paralysis to all Evo Cards. (Can't attack or use items, and abilities do not activate.)

436.name: Philosophy
436.abilityText: If user has a card with the Synthesis ability in hand, draw 3 cards / If not, user draws 2 cards.

437.name: Plague
437.abilityText: Adds Poison to all creatures. (At the end of a battle, the creature's base HP is reduced by half of its MHP.)

438.name: Poison Mind
438.abilityText: User views the top 6 cards in target enemy Cepter's book, then selects 1 to destroy. / User draws a card.

439.name: Prophecy
439.abilityText: User draws 1 card of a specified type from their book.

440.name: Purify
440.abilityText: Removes all Enchantment effects from the map. User then gains (number of Enchantments removed x50)G.

441.name: Quicksand
441.abilityText: Adds Force Stop to target creature. (The next enemy Cepter who tries to pass this creature within 2 rounds must stop here.)

442.name: Quietude
442.abilityText: Adds Mute to all Cepters (Spells cannot be used for one round.)

443.name: Quintessence
443.abilityText: Changes a target territory with a level lower than 5 to Multi.

444.name: Ray of Law
444.abilityText: Destroys all cards with a value of 100G and up in all Cepters' hands.

445.name: Ray of Purge
445.abilityText: Destroys all Enchant spell cards in all Cepters' hands.

446.name: Redivision
446.abilityText: Redistributes all Cepters' magic so that it is spread equally among them.

447.name: Reincarnation
447.abilityText: User discards all cards from current hand and draws a number of cards equal to the number they discarded +1.

448.name: Release
448.abilityText: Adds Unlock Limits to user. (For 4 rounds, ignore item restrictions and land restrictions.)

449.name: Relief
449.abilityText: Exchanges creatures in 2 of user's territories. / Recycles to Book

450.name: Remission
450.abilityText: Target gate will be marked as passed. (Cannot be used on the final gate needed to complete a lap.)

451.name: Remote Switch
451.abilityText: Changes the direction of all Path Switches. / Recycles to Book. / If no Path Switch is present, user draws a card.

452.name: Restore
452.abilityText: Removes Fatigued from target creature. / Fully recovers target creature's HP.

453.name: Revival
453.abilityText: Target Cepter's book is reverted to the state it was in when the game began.

454.name: Senility
454.abilityText: Adds Last Breath to target creature. (This creature is destroyed at the end of battle.)

455.name: Sense of Wild
455.abilityText: User draws a card. If the drawn card is a creature, it is summoned to a random vacant land.

456.name: Shatter
456.abilityText: User selects an Item or Spell Card from target enemy Cepter's hand and destroys it.

457.name: Shining Geyser
457.abilityText: HP-30 to target enemy creature. / Synthesis: Instant Spells (Changes effect to HP-40.)

458.name: Sigil of Drain
458.abilityText: Adds Drain Spell to target creature with no Secret Art. (Grants Secret Art (20G): User steals 10% of target enemy Cepter's Current Magic.)

459.name: Sigil of Float
459.abilityText: Adds Move Spell to target creature with no Secret Art. (Grants Secret Art (50G): Adds Dice 5 to target Cepter.)

460.name: Sigil of Shrink
460.abilityText: Adds Shrink Spell to target creature with no Secret Art. (Grants Secret Art (50G): MHP-10 to target creature.)

461.name: Sneak Hand
461.abilityText: Hidden / User steals a card from the hand of a target enemy Cepter with two or more Item Cards.

462.name: Solid World
462.abilityText: Adds Land Protection to the world. (For 6 rounds, lands cannot have their level lowered and their element cannot be changed by spells.)

463.name: Spartoi
463.abilityText: Places a Skeleton on a random vacant land.

464.name: Speed Penalty
464.abilityText: User steals (target's lap # - user's lap # x100)G from the enemy with the highest lap number. (If user has highest lap number, no G will be taken.)

465.name: Spirit Walk
465.abilityText: Adds Distant Movement to target creature. (Creature can move to any vacant land.)

466.name: Squeeze
466.abilityText: User chooses a card from target Cepter's hand and destroys it. / Target Cepter gains 150G.

467.name: Steal Gem
467.abilityText: User steals one random element gem from target enemy Cepter. / If there is no Gem Store, user will steal 80G from target enemy Cepter.

468.name: Stone Blast
468.abilityText: HP-30 to target Earth or Air creature.

469.name: Storm Shift
469.abilityText: Changes target level 3 or lower Water territory into a Air land, or changes target level 3 or lower Air territory into a Water land.

470.name: Subsidence
470.abilityText: Lowers level of target enemy Cepter's highest level territory by 1. / Synthesis: Subsidence (Changes target to all Cepters.).

471.name: Sudden Impact
471.abilityText: Hidden / Lowers level of target level 4 territory by 1.

473.name: Theft
473.abilityText: User chooses a spell card from target enemy Cepter's hand and steals it.

474.name: Thrust Blow
474.abilityText: Moves target creature to adjacent vacant territory.

475.name: Thunderclap
475.abilityText: Hidden / HP-30 to target creature with summon conditions.

476.name: Tiny Army
476.abilityText: Hidden / If user has 5 or more creatures with MHP of 30 or under, those creatures receive MHP +10 and user gains 500G. / If not, Recycles to Book.

477.name: Turn to the Wall
477.abilityText: Transforms target creature into a specific Defensive creature of the same element.

478.name: Tyranny
478.abilityText: Adds Paralysis to all creatures with MHP of 30 and under. (Creatures cannot attack or use items and their abilities do not activate.)

479.name: Uniformity
479.abilityText: Gives 200 Toll to target Cepter. (For 3 rounds, the toll fee for all of a Cepter's territories become 200G.)

480.name: Vitality
480.abilityText: Adds Ability +20 to target creature. (In battle, this creature is granted ST & HP+20.) / User draws a card.

481.name: Vortex
481.abilityText: Adds No Battle Abilities to target creature. (In battle, effects and abilities besides this one do not activate.) / User draws a card.

482.name: Waste World
482.abilityText: Adds Raise Cost to the world. (For 6 rounds, cards of rarity S require 1.5xG to use, cards of rarity R and E require 2x G to use.)

483.name: Water Shift
483.abilityText: Changes target territory belonging to user into a Water land.

484.name: Wind of Hope
484.abilityText: User draws 2 cards from their book.
